DeviceManager::Iterator

DeviceManager::Iterator Class Reference

#include <Apoxi/Devices/DeviceManager.hpp>

Detailed Description

Allows to iterate over all devices which have been added to the device manager. Sample code: 
		for (DeviceManager::Iterator it; it.Get() != 0; ++it) {
			AbstractDevice* device = it.Get();
			...
		}

Note that the device manager will be locked until the destructor of the iterator will be invoked.

DeviceManager::Iterator::~Iterator (   ) 
 

Member Function Documentation

BOOLEAN DeviceManager::Iterator::Begin (   ) 
 

Resets the iterator to the begin. FALSE is returned if no device has been added to the device manager.

AbstractDevice* DeviceManager::Iterator::Get (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the current device. 0 is returned if no device has been added to the device manager or the iterator has exceeded the end.

DeviceManager::Iterator DeviceManager::Iterator::operator++ (  INT   ) 
 

Moves the iterator to the next device.

DeviceManager::Iterator & DeviceManager::Iterator::operator++ (   ) 
 

Moves the iterator to the next device.
